scripts.dev: parcel src/index.html  src/notFound.html src/serverError.html src/chatList.html src/profile.html src/signIn.html src/signUp.html -p 3000  --target default --dist-dir ./build
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/index.html  src/notFound.html src/serverError.html src/chatList.html src/profile.html src/signIn.html src/signUp.html
scripts.prestart: parcel build src/index.html  src/notFound.html src/serverError.html src/chatList.html src/profile.html src/signIn.html src/signUp.html
